2.title: FROM PAGE TO SCREEN

3.title: MAKING CONNECTIONS
clues: This country's longest bridge at 8 miles connects New Brunswick & Prince Edward Island

4.title: GLUTEN-FREE FOODS
clues: There's an octet of veggies in this alphanumeric brand's vegetable juice, but no gluten
This classic canned meat from Hormel that debuted in 1937 has no gluten
In the U.S., this soda is gluten free, as its Vanilla Zero version
